survey_name: Smart Office Air Quality Impact Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee perceptions and satisfaction regarding air quality in smart office environments, focusing on its impact on productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall air quality in your smart office environment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure question displays correctly on mobile devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall air quality in your smart office environment?

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your smart office? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'None of the above' to capture absence of issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes. Display options in a randomized order.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your smart office? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use personal air quality devices (e.g., portable air purifiers) in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use clear frequency intervals. Avoid overlapping ranges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Ensure vertical layout for readability.

script.question_text: How often do you use personal air quality devices (e.g., portable air purifiers) in your workspace?

questions.question_text: In your opinion, how does air quality impact your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced 5-point scale to capture nuanced responses. Clarify 'productivity' if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Disable 'Back' button to ensure response integrity.

script.question_text: In your opinion, how does air quality impact your productivity at work?

questions.question_text: What additional measures would you recommend to improve air quality in your smart office?
questions.client_notes: Keep open-ended to gather qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input. Enable spell-check and auto-capitalization.

script.question_text: What additional measures would you recommend to improve air quality in your smart office?
